text: Frozen RNAlater TM samples were embedded in Tissue-Tek ® O.C.T. Compound (Sakura ® Finetek USA Inc., Alphen aan den Rijn, The Netherlands) in a cryostat at −20 • C before sectioning at 8-10 µm onto PEN Membrane Glass Slides (Applied Biosystems™, Waltham, MA, USA) and staining according to published protocols ( [38] ). The slides were completely air dried before LCM to allow for proper excision performance.
